Verses: 1 yoodhaa Puththirarin Koththiraththirku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Undaana Panguveedhamaavadhu: Edhomin Ellaikku Arugaana Seen Vanaandharame Thenpuraththin Kadaiyellai.
2 thenpuramaana Avargaludaiya Ellai Uppukkadalin Kadaisiyil Therku Mugamaayirukkira Munaithuvakki,
3 thenpuraththilirukkira Akraabeemin Medugalukkum, Angeyirundhu Seenukkum Poi, Therkeyirukkira Kaadhesparneyaavukku Eri, Esronaik Kadandhu, Aadhaarukku Eri, Karkkaavai Sutrippoi,
4 asmonukkum, Angeyirundhu Egipthin Aatrukkum Sendru, Kadalmattum Poi Mudiyum; Idhuve Ungalukkuth Thenpuramaana Ellaiyaayirukkum Endraan.
5 keezhppuramaana Ellai, Yordhaan Mugaththuvaaramattum Irukkira Uppukkadal. Vadapuramaana Ellai, Yordhaan Mugaththuvaaramirukkira Kadalin Munai Thuvakki,
6 pedheklaavukku Eri, Vadakkeyirukkira Pedharapaavaik Kadandhu, Roobanin Kumaaranaagiya Poganin Kallukku Erippoi,

7 appuram Aagor Pallaththaakkai Vittuth Thebeerukku Eri, Vadakke Aatrin Thenpuramaana Adhummeemin Mettukku Munbaaga Irukkira Kilkaalukku Neraagavum, Angeyirundhu Ensemesin Thanneeridaththukkum Poi, Rogel Ennum Kinatrukku Sendru,

8 appuram Eboosiyar Kudiyirukkira Erusalemukkuth Thenpuramaai Innomudaiya Kumaaranin Pallaththaakkaik Kadandhu, Vadakkeyirukkira Raatchadharudaiya Pallaththaakkin Kadaisiyil Merkaaga Innom Pallaththaakkin Munnirukkira Malaiyin Sigaramattum Erippoi,
9 andha Malaiyin Sigaraththilirundhu Nepdhovaavin Neerootrukkup Poi, Epperon Malaiyin Pattanangalukku Sendru, Keeriyaadhyeyaareemaagiya Paalaavukkup Poi,
10 paalaavilirundhu Merke Seyeer Malaikkuth Thirumbi, Vadakkeyirukkira Kesalonaagiya Yeyaareem Malaikkup Pakkamaaip Poi, Pedhshimesukku Irangi, Thimnaavukkup Poi,
11 appuram Vadakkeyirukkira Ekronukkup Pakkamaai Sendru, Sikronukku Odi, Paalaamalaiyaikkadandhu, Yaapniyelukku Sendru, Kadalile Mudiyum.
12 merpuramaana Ellai, Periya Samuththirame; Idhu Yoodhaa Puththirarukku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Sutrilumirukkum Ellai.
13 eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalebukku, Yosuvaa, Karththar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyittapadi, Enaakkin Thagappanaagiya Arpaavin Pattanamaana Ebironai, Yoodhaa Puththirarin Naduve, Pangaagak Koduththaan.
14 angeyirundha Sesaai, Akeemaan, Thalmaai Ennum Enaakkin Moondru Kumaararaiyum Kaaleb Thuraththivittu,
15 angeyirundhu Thebeerin Kudigalidaththirkup Ponaan; Murkaalaththile Thebeerin Per Keeriyaadhsepper.
16 keeriyaadhsepperai Sangaarampannippidikkiravanukku, En Kumaaraththiyaagiya Aksaalai Vivaagampannikkoduppen Endru Kaaleb Sonnaan.
17 appozhudhu Kaalebin Sagodharanaagiya Kenaasin Magan Odhniyel Adhaip Pidiththaan; Aagaiyaal Than Kumaaraththi Aksaalai Avanukku Vivaagampannikkoduththaan.

18 avan Purappadugaiyil, En Thagappanidaththil Oru Vayalveliyaik Ketkavendum Endru Avanidaththil Uththaravu Petrukkondu, Kazhudhaiyinmelirundhu Iranginaal. Kaaleb Paarththu: Unakku Ennavendum Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Aval: Enakku Oru Aaseervaadham Tharavendum; Enakku Varatchiyaana Nilaththaith Thandheer; Neerppaaichchalaana Nilaththaiyum Enakkuth Tharavendum Endraal; Appozhudhu Avalukku Merpuraththilum Keezhppuraththilum Neerppaaichchalaana Nilangalaik Koduththaan.
20 yoodhaa Puththirarukku Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Undaana Sudhandharam Ennavendraal:
21 kadaiyaandharath Thenpuramaana Edhomin Ellaikku Neraai, Yoodhaa Puththirarin Koththiraththirkuk Kidaiththa Pattanangalaavana: Kapseyel, Edher, Yaakoor,
22 keenaa, Thimonaa, Adhaadhaa,
23 kedhes, Aadhsor, Idhnaan,
24 seep, Thelem, Peyaalodh,
25 aadhsor, Adhaaththaa, Keeriyodh, Esron Ennum Aadhsor,
26 aamaam, Semaa, Molaadhaa,
27 aadhsaarkadhaa, Esmon, Pedhpaaledh,
28 aadhsaarsuvaal, Peyersepaa, Pisyodhyaa,
29 paalaa, Eeyim, Aadhsem,
30 eldholaadh, Keseel, Ormaa,
31 siklaak, Madhmannaa, Sansannaa,
32 lepaayodh, Silleem, Aayin, Rimmon Enbavaigal; Ellaappattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Irubaththonbadhu.
33 pallaththaakku Naattil Esdhaavel, Soriyaa, Ashnaa
34 sanokaa, Enkanneem, Thappuvaa, Enaam,
35 yarmoodh, Adhullaam, Sokko, Asekkaa,
36 saaraayeem, Adhiththaayeem, Kedheraa, Kedheroththaayeem; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Padhinaangu.
37 senaan, Adhaashaa, Mikdhalkaadh,
38 thiliyaan, Mispe, Yokdheyel,
39 laakees, Poskaadh, Eklon,
40 kaapon, Lagamaam, Kidhleesh,
41 kedherodh, Pedhtaakon, Naagamaa, Makkedhaa; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Padhinaaru.
42 lipnaa, Ethther, Aashaan,
43 ipdhaa, Asnaa, Nedhseep,
44 kekilaa, Akseep, Mareshaa; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Onbadhu.
45 ekronum Adhin Velinilangalum Graamangalum,
46 ekron Thuvakki Samuththirammattum, Asthoththin Puraththilirukkira Sagala Oorgalum, Avaigalin Graamangalum,
47 asthoththum, Adhin Velinilangalum Graamangalum, Kaasaavum Egipthin Nadhimattumirukkira Adhin Velinilangalum Graamangalume; Periya Samuththirame Ellai.
48 malaigalil, Saameer, Yaaththeer, Sokko,
49 thannaa, Thepeer Ennappatta Keeriyaadhsannaa,
50 aanaap, Esdhemo, Aaneem,
51 kosen, Olon, Kilo; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Padhinondru.
52 araap, Thoomaa, Eshiyaan,
53 yaanoom, Peththappuvaa, Aappekkaa,
54 umdhaa, Ebironaagiya Keeriyaadh Arpaa, Seeyor; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Onbadhu.
55 maakon, Karmel, Seep, Yuththaa,
56 yesrayel, Yokdheyaam, Sanokaa,
57 kaayin, Kipiyaa, Thimnaa; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Paththu.
58 alkool, Pedhsoor, Kedhor,
59 magaaraadh, Pedhaanodh, Eldhekon; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Aaru.
60 keeriyaadhyeyaareemaagiya Keeriyaadh Paagaal, Rapaa; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Irandu.
61 vanaandharaththil, Pedh-arapaa, Miththeen, Sekkaakkaa,
62 nipsaan, Uppuppattanam, Enkedhi; Indhap Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumutpada Aaru.
63 erusalemile Kudiyirundha Eboosiyarai Yoodhaa Puththirar Thuraththividak Koodaamarpoyitru; Aagaiyaal Innaalmattum Eboosiyar Yoodhaa Puththirarode Erusalemile Kudiyirukkiraargal.
